pages.text: SimpleFarming adds many crops and foods. If you eat a large variety of foods, your max health will increase!$(br2)$(o)*This mechanic applies to all foods. Craft a Food Book to see what foods you have eaten.

pages.title: Crops
pages.text: There are a lot of crops added by SimpleFarming. Most of them grow like Wheat, but some (like corn) grow two blocks high.
Grapes are grown on Fences, as shown here.

pages.title: Fruit Trees
pages.text: Fruit trees are rare, thin trees that have fruit-bearing leaves. The leaves will drop the appropriate fruit tree saplings, but you can also craft them.

pages.title: Berry Bushes
pages.text: Berry bushes that rapidly grow tasty berries. These berries are a good source of dye.

pages.title: Scarecrow
pages.text: Scarecrows prevent crops from being trampled in a 10-block radius. They must be planted on dirt-like blocks like flowers.

pages.title: Meals
pages.text: Lots of filling meals can be crafted with the crops you grow. These far exceed the saturation values of vanilla foods and will keep you full for a long time.

pages.title: Brewing
pages.text: A brewing barrel, for brewing alchoholic beverages. Add certain crops to the barrel, wait, and then use a Glass Bottle to extract the brew. Alchohol gives buffs, but there's a downside if you drink too much of it (as you'd expect.)
Here you can see what foods you have eaten, and how many you need for bonus hearts.
